title: Drawing, St. Peter's Basilica and Vatican City (Seen from the North), Rome, Italy, January 1869
title_raw: St. Peter's Basilica and Vatican City (Seen from the North), Rome, Italy
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite at upper right:  7 rich dark laky  2  Dazzling gold  /  8 brown  3  laky brandy glow  /  4 duller and darker  /  5 warm neut[ral]  6 deep warm grey blue; at center right: mem; and with figures throughout.

Verso: Inscribed in graphite at top left: Brasei Palace; at lower margin: 4 creamy - warm Brown / 2 Reddish orange  gl[ow] / subdued and smoky / 3 misty grey.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of the St. Peter's Basilica and the Vatican with a man and a woman standing in the left foreground.

Verso:  Horzontal view of roofs and domes with a tree in the foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, St. Peter's Basilica and Vatican City (Seen from the North), Rome, Italy, January 1869. Graphite on paper. 
Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-161
